markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Nugrah](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2285)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Nugrah](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2285)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 183</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), filthy rags, [wooden (and bloodstained) symbol of Gozreh](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 75

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +12,
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 23, attack +21
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245)
- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175), [Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)
- **2nd**
[Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299)
- **3rd**
[Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316)

**Survival of the Fittest** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** A 1st- or higher-level animal summoned by Nugrah is killed within 30 feet of him; **Effect** Blood- red energy flows from the slain creature into Nugrah's mouth. He immediately heals 1d6 Hit Points per level of the slain animal, gaining any excess healing as temporary Hit Points that last for 10 minutes. As long as he possesses these temporary Hit Points, blood-red energy ripples across his flesh and his AC increases to 22.

**Swift Summon** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Prerequisite** Nugrah has a summon animal spell prepared and available. **Effect** Nugrah casts summon animal but does not need to use a material component.

</column>
name: Nugrah
